location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Letter from the Commander of the Sloop Clive, at Bushire, to Major Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf,'

mods.abstract: Letter from the Commander of the Sloop Clive, at Bushire, to Major Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, enclosing copy of a letter from the Commander of the Sloop Clive, at Muscat, to Captain Sir Robert Oliver RN Superintendent to the Indian Navy, 24 January 1846.
